alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Cleveland; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Bradley, southeastern Cleveland and Drew Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weeks, or 10 miles northwest of Warren, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Warren... Wilmar... Green Hill... Weeks... Brandon... Plantersville... Banks... New Hope in Drew County... Enon... Selma... Collins... Orlando... Montongo... Rock Springs... New Edinburg... Rye... Carmel... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Arkansas.
